author: newsr.in
title: Technology › Child's play shifts to mobile gadgets - newsR
text: Children are going mobile with their video game play, shifting away from computers and consoles, according to a report released by NPD Group. Mobile devices are now the most used gadgets for video game play by U.S. children ranging in age from two to 17 years old, according to a… »
